Offering Panal to the Bullfighter | Mary Cassatt Postcard

Review Offering Panal to the Bullfighter | Mary Cassatt Postcard – Postcards Mary Cassatt Postcard Have a promotion during this period Offering Panal to the Bullfighter quality productsOffering the Panal to the Bullfighter (1873) by American impressionist artist Mary Cassatt. This oil on canvas painting depicts a young woman flirtatiously offering a glass of water to a bullfighter, who dips panal (honeycomb) into it to make a refreshing drink. Cassatt made several paintings of local Spanish customs during her 1873 stay in Spain.

Use the design tools to add custom text or personalize the image. Price:$1.45
